name: Pointless or suspicious traffic from another country
description: Ensure that the majority of sessions are made using the hostname corresponding to the country.  If there is a high amount of sessions that was generated in a country (e.g. United States) to a hostname other than US (e.g. Poland), it indicates a suspicious traffic on the said hostname, and thus, an anomaly to observe in more detail.

blocks.description: Checks largest source countries of the traffic
